apple_vendor_description: The merman emoji on Apple devices presents a captivating figure with medium-dark skin, rendered with Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading that accentuates its powerful musculature and flowing tail. Realistic lighting casts subtle highlights on his scales and wavy, dark hair, giving him an aquatic, mythical presence. He often conveys a sense of mystery, strength, or a connection to the sea, appearing as a proud and regal inhabitant of the ocean depths on Apple devices.
